tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: The Longest Words in the English Language
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis:
Scary 'Mary Poppins' Recut Trailer, Honorificabilitudinitas, Supercalifragilisticexpialidocious, ablative, Antidisestablishmentarianism, Church of England, Henry VIII, Thomas Cranmer, Martin Luther, floccinoccinihilipilification, Pneumonoultramicroscopicsilicovolcanoconiosis, The National Puzzlers' League, Titin
Join us at Rocketboom.com for an ad free experience.

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview:
I
Yes.
I
I dare you.﻿

theres is a word that has 189,819 characters Chemical name of titin, the largest known﻿ protein
and 1,909 character Longest published word
well as long﻿ as the word is latin based. its valid for our language.
Wow, I'm subscribing. Just found this﻿ video serendipitously. Awesome! :-)
longest﻿ word in english is a protein complex called 'Titin'
Try this: the longest words in﻿ SEVENTEEN languages! watch?v=r3cadfo-YY4

i made﻿ for u longer word njdsehfbfhwgsnrniuwhmfsiuweghfeuiwhsiouyjedmghbisjasohdygshjkkdfgehjklkfejhwdbwshijkodijehgvcbhjkodlsk,jhfgghkffsghfjrehgghyekjhfbvhghrjehghhfrgnvijkhvbfwsgjvhfbsvhjshfevjukvgjrndjhkrhvufvjjhijrmnvbgjtgrhgkjrgbhgrjgkjhrgjdhfgehdhufgrhjfgrhjdfhugieefjhdjhddshnbcbcdhdklandjkehhfjrfdbnjnmcbcdshlufyfuiryuyrhfljknm,nfdcncnmcnmcvmnbbhfyirorurhjdkncxncxfekhruiruhjfdnmcnbciwrygakqplkmnbvzczxghakkdueyyeunxhfhmeetoobdgxnygxyjheeeegshewfmetooehsbhnuefjhiamcoolegshugeryujwgfhuwijfmm
Longest word: TROLOLOLOLOLOLOLOLOLOLOLOLOLOLOLOLOLOLO and etc. It has infinite letters and the first person to fully﻿ recite the word will receive a free, hand-me-down T-shirt.
Chemical name for Titin is the largest. Also why the hell do people think it's that stupid volcaniosis shit, do some research﻿ it's literally one of the first search results on google.
very knowledgeable video which is never learn one thing from and dont know what the hell﻿ are you saying...reminds me of school

Reviewer.Books: Ehh.... I can't really remember all that many books. I don't read books that often.
Reviewer.Movies:
Movies: Jurassic Park Trilogy, Avatar, various other action and adventure movies.
Shows: Mostly Discovery Channel and similar channels, but sometimes stupid soaps. Sometimes...

Reviewer.Books: Tolstoy, Dostoyevskij, Everything by William Golding , Nabokov ,William Blake ,Charlie Dickens, Hemingway´s short stories , Joseph Conrad , Robbie Burns , Maxim Gorky , George Orwell , Albert Camus ,Bronte sisters , Dylan Thomas , Matthew Arnold , Tove Jansson´s ´Moomin Stories ´ ,Grahame´s ´The Wind in the Willows ´ .
Reviewer.Movies: Historical epics , like Spartacus , Gladiator etc . Musical shows ; Celtic Electric , for instance , is a good one .
Reviewer.Music: Everything by the Doors ,Blues , classic rock ,Celtic folk music .From Scotland , Ireland , Wales , Brittany , Breton Island .
